pages.text: To my esteemed colleagues of the Eternal University,$(br2)All of my Enlighted existence I have labored tirelessly to bring Enlightenment to all whom the Magistocracy have deemed worthy to share in its light. I have strived to be a beacon of Enlightenment to all, but no longer can I turn a blind eye to the delusions that this University has allowed to

fester.$(br2)The Enlightenment that the Grand Architects shared was not meant for the vulgar peasantry. Enlightenment is for the pure; we cannot continue to dilute our ranks with crude Novices who will never become anything more than Journeymen.$(br2)Due to the increase of this practice, despite my many protests, I no longer feel that Enlightenment is truly the highest goal of the Council
of Masters.$(br2)I have therefore decided to resign from this once great fellowship effective immediately.$(br2)$(l)Official Resignation of Master Rashelon$()$(br2)$(o)1634, Spring's Birth$()
